somethingWentWrong: I'm afraid something has gone wrong :( Try again later...
NanoOver: NaNoWriMo is over. See you next year! :D
customSpecifyCommand: You need to specify a prompt and an answer for your message. Use the `--` operator before your prompt and answer (e.g., `!custom --my prompt --my answer`)
customCommandAdded: The custom prompt and answer have been added.
customCommandChanged: The custom answer has been modified.
customCommandsNeedToBeDifferent: Your custom prompt and answer have to be different.
helpMessage:
Hi! My name is Omlabot!
Here is my command list:
`!help`: To know my command list.
`!wordcount`: To know the wordcount to achieve for today.
`!prompt`: To get a random writing prompt.
`!cheer`: To cheer you up.
`Who da best?`: To know who's the best :) 
Enjoy!
